text:
—Me, in the past?
I was just a woman you could find anywhere.

I worked, covered in ashes, like everyone else.
I even fell in love, a love I thought would last a lifetime.

I even took revenge, a revenge I thought was worth dying for.
How about that, it's pretty common, right?

The fires, the scenes of grief that are common in everyone's life,
I lived through them passionately, without any regrets.

—It was good until then.
If it had been 'happily ever after' there.

But... I'm sure there are people like that everywhere, right?
The kind of person who missed the timing to end it.

I crossed over to other worlds,
but I learned that even that was a 'common story'.

There were many women
like me in every world.

All that they were to be born under such a star,
women who were lucky— or incredibly unlucky.

In the style of this place, in other words, women who have
the same Role and Rule as me.

I cross the rainbow again. How many times has it been?
The light disappeared, and I landed in a new world.

I arrived in a new world.
Immediately after, I heard a voice calling for help.

I don't know anything about this world.
But when I followed the voice, it seemed that a fire had broken out.

'She' went into the fire, as requested.
While getting covered in ashes, she protected the child, as requested.

'Thank you very much,
I don't know how to thank you—'

However, I'm not looking for a reward.
Because it is my duty to grant wishes.

'At least your name',
at those words, she kept her mouth shut.

She, who had been given many names and definitions in many worlds.
However, she had none in this world yet—

She did not have a single definition
of what she was.

The rescued child
stared at her, who was showing confusion.

And, to her, who was covered in white ashes all over, yet had an
atmosphere like glass burned until it was transparent, the child said this.

'Um... Thank you very much.
Cinderella, Princess of Ashes.'

She doesn't know how she appeared in the child's eyes.
She didn't know what that name meant at that time either.

She got a new name, that's all.
Just as she had gotten many names before.

name: Kokopelli
text:
It's different from what I was chasing, but certainly
all of you also have a certain kind of power capable of manipulating luck.

The Transient, a cyborg insect I met at a certain bar,
pointed at me and said so.

name: Kokopelli
text:
It's not 'being able to not die',
but a kind of 'prohibition' of 'not being able to die'.

name: Kokopelli
text:
Just as in this one body of mine, there is a soul
of a 'grasshopper' comrade that is different from me.

name: Kokopelli
text:
In your body too, there is a 'comrade of yours'
that is different from you—

name: Kokopelli
text:
As long as you are with them, there will never be a day
when you will meet the 'end that is salvation'.

Finale:
From the Ashes

In the material warehouse under the volcano area of T.S.L.
The rescued staff are being transported while the smell of smoke still lingers.

Thanks to the rescue and evacuation guidance of [Player] and the others,
the damage did not spread and the situation calmed down.

name: Yuma
text:
...[Player], you're injured here.
Band-aid, disinfectant, I have, hold still.

name: Yuma
text:
—There, it's alright.
[Player], any other injuries?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player], you were amazing.
Into that fire, you went, and saved them, amazing.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm, fine.
My nose hurts a little from the smoke... but it's better now.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player], you were amazing.
Into that fire, you went, and saved them, amazing.

name: Yuma
text:
Oscar, said to report, to client.
Hogen-sensei, went to protect, the slimes.

name: Red Hood
text:
...You should rest too, Yuma-kun.
You've been helping out with something or other the whole time.

name: Red Hood
text:
Thank you for bringing the fire extinguishers.
Your reaction was so fast, it even surprised me.

name: Yuma
text:
Oil fire, if pour water, bad.
I knew, so, thought couldn't use, fire hydrant.

name: Red Hood
text:
That's right. I just looked at the list, but as expected, lubricating oil was also
stored, so it was the right decision not to use water.

name: Hogen
text:
—Hey, you guys,
I brought you something to drink. You haven't had anything, have you?

name: Hogen
text:
The military doctor told me to 'drink something even if you don't want to'.
He was just treating the last rescued person. He should be here soon.

name: Red Hood
text:
Thank you, Hogen-san.
...You were a huge help too, Hogen-san.

name: Red Hood
text:
It's amazing enough to keep securing an escape route on site,
but to rescue us with Shennong-sensei too.

name: Red Hood
text:
We were lightly equipped, so if you hadn't come at that time,
we might not be standing here right now.

name: Hogen
text:
I heard the sound of the collapse. The additional fire extinguishing equipment
arrived at the same time, so I charged in with Shennong-dono.

name: Hogen
text:
As someone who has failed in the past,
I didn't want to repeat the same thing out of hesitation.

name: Hogen
text:
And at that time, the evacuation was over,
and Oscar-dono and Yuma-kun took over securing the escape route.

name: Hogen
text:
But if I had been a little more... No, I won't say it.
Too much is as bad as too little.

name: Hogen
text:
...When you've calmed down,
you should go to the infirmary.

options.text: Securing an escape route is the most important thing.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player] is right.
We probably didn't have time to wait for reinforcements this time.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...What strong young people.
To think I'd be the one to be encouraged.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm fine, thank you.
Thanks to my kind junior, somehow.

name: Red Hood
text:
...For now, I'll prioritize
my job as a firefighter.

name: Red Hood
text:
That's right, I'm a firefighter now.
Since Sandra is not here, I have to take her place.

name: Red Hood
text:
Just like when she believed in me as a good wolf,
she has entrusted me to be a firefighter...!

name: Red Hood
text:
...For now, let's wait
until the room temperature drops.

The conversation stops, and as if to cover up the silence,
the group drinks their drinks.

name: Assistant Shark
text:
The room temperature in the closed area is stable.
Exhaust and ventilation of the fire extinguishing gas is complete.

name: Red Hood
text:
Alright, I'm going to investigate the scene.
[Player]... I'll leave it up to you whether you come or not.

name: Hogen
text:
I'll accompany you.
I need to be present as a police officer.

options.text: The possibility is not zero yet.

name: Yuma
text:
I'll go too. The ecology of the fire slimes,
if it's related, I might, know something.

name: Yuma
text:
And, for now, want to be, with [Player].
For now... don't want to be, alone.

name: Oscar
text:
As long as it doesn't interfere with the investigation,
I'd like to be present as well. As the site manager.

name: Oscar
text:
And if possible, I'd like the
first aid team leader to accompany us as well?

name: Shennong
text:
Ah, you'll need my diagnosis.
To write in the report what happened to the person who was left.

name: Red Hood
text:
Understood. Then everyone get ready.
I'll go in first and check for safety.

Red Hood carefully investigates whether
there is a risk of collapse if they enter.

The warehouse itself is sturdy, and
the shelves are in a state where they cannot fall any further.

And so, as Red Hood judged it safe to enter,
[Player] and the others stepped into the ash-covered warehouse.

options.text: There are a lot of ruptured cans.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text: Ah, there's no doubt that those are the remains of several types of lubricating oil and fuel that were stored.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
The problem is, where did those slimes get in from.
I thought I had taken thorough measures after the incident before the opening...

options.text: There are burnt marks on the wall like a path.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Must be, fire slime, trace.
But, normally, don't make, such complex, movements.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Surely, the slime, in a panic.
Surprised, by something, tried to find, a hiding place, I think.
[Player] searches every corner of the rough warehouse, straining their eyes for any traces.
However, the site where many fuel cans had ruptured was scattered, and it was a difficult task to identify things with the debris and ash in the way.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Ah, [Player].
Does the fact that our eyes met mean we're thinking the same thing...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, no. I'm a firefighter.
First, I have to identify the source of the fire.

text:
In more ways than one, they won't know until they check.
In the heavy atmosphere, [Player] and the others search for clues.

name: Shennong
text:
—[Player], are you alright?
Any injuries, dizziness, or are you hiding something?

name: Shennong
text:
I don't trust your 'I'm fine', you know.
To be honest, I'd like to strip you down and examine you.

name: Shennong
text:
...No, I'm sorry,
I didn't mean to be sarcastic.

Shennong didn't look at [Player], but stared at the
debris with distant eyes, as if he's trying to visualize the time of the fire.

name: Shennong
text:
For now, I'll just be glad that
I could at least be of help to you.

name: Shennong
text:
If I don't fulfill my duty, my comrades are in danger.
But if I adhere to my duty, my comrades are in danger again... What a predicament.

name: Oscar
text:
The responsibility is mine.
It's the result of my overconfidence in my perfect measures.

name: Oscar
text:
I had forgotten that it is the audience, not the author,
who decides the quality of a script.

name: Red Hood
text:
If you say so, then me too,
I held Sandra back again...

options.text: If only I had more strength...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's right.
As expected of my beloved disciple. You're strong.

options.text: There are other things to do now.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's right.
As expected of my beloved disciple. You're strong.

name: Hogen
text:
I understand everyone's feelings.
I understand the frustration of not being strong enough.

name: Hogen
text:
Even if a strategist has exhausted all measures,
there are still things that can be lost...

name: Hogen
text:
But we can't get caught up in that and lose even more.
That's what you taught me.

name: Yuma
text:
...I, did my best.
For [Player], for everyone, I did my best.

name: Yuma
text:
Everyone, too, for everyone, did their best.
Person I saved, thanked me, many times.
No one's fault.

options.text: They just wandered in, that's all.

text:
The group nods at Yuma and Hogen's words.
And just as they were about to return to their investigation—

name: Red Hood
text:
Oh no, it's rekindling!
Everyone, behind me—!!

The ashes and debris, which should have been quiet,
burst into flames without any warning.

And before [Player] and the others' eyes,
'she' rose from the ashes.

name: Red Hood
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">San... dra...!?

options.text: Even though the App isn't running!?

name: Oscar
text:
What on earth happened...!?
This is an underground space, but—

name: Oscar
text:
If the conditions for a closed area are met,
the entire warehouse should have been reset.
Could it be that you are—

name: Cinderella
text:
From the looks of it...
The rescue was successful—

name: Red Hood
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">Sandra!!

name: Red Hood
text:
How much... do you think I was worried about you!?
I don't know what's going on, but even I, your buddy didn't know!?

name: Red Hood
text:
To think I couldn't protect you again because of me...
If you were alright, you should have told me from the beginning!!

options.text: I wish you had at least told me.

text:
Relief, joy, and anger.
They are all jumbled up and directed at Cinderella.

name: Hogen
text:
That really gave me a scare. But being crushed
and filled with gas, is it more correct to say she was revived?

name: Hogen
text:
An immortal being, to think I'd face one here.
Cinderella... At least say something.

name: Shennong
text:
No wonder you charged in.
But that flame just now, it seems familiar—

name: Yuma
text:
I, don't care, about anything else.
Now, everyone safe. I'm, fine, with that.

To be burned at the foot of a sacred mountain, and to be revived in front of believers.
It's something she's experienced countless times in some world.

But the ecstatic gazes that were poured on her each time,
she couldn't feel a single one of them.

name: Cinderella
text:
...That's right. You all
were looking at me with those eyes.

name: Cinderella
text:
I'm sorry, but—
now that 'the ash-covered magic is over', I can't stay here anymore.

name: Cinderella
text:
The wish, has been granted.
It's about time, you wake up from a dream that's like a beautiful dress.

It is an 'inevitability' equivalent to the sun setting after rising.
At that time, it is 'natural' to have to hide from the world.

In the burning wish,
I truly lived passionately.

But eventually, it will burn out. Just as night comes after day.
At least in one of 'my hometowns', it was believed so.

In the tropical paradise where hot sand blows up to the top of your head,
the otherworld Aaru...

The law of the sun rising and setting.
The 'promise of time' that does not allow eternal burning.

If there are those who disturb this 'cycle',
they are considered foreign objects that interfere with the 'Faith' and must be 'eliminated'.

name: Cinderella
text:
Ah, it's coming out!
The 'memories' that I had suppressed in my body that had burned out once—!!

options.text: Why are you using flames now...?
Did you catch fire from the previous fire?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm not that senile!
I just apologized a moment ago, didn't I!!

name: Yuma
text:
Movements, are coordinated.
Like, living creature. Different, from natural fire!!

name: Red Hood
text:
It's not rekindling,
this is Sandra's own flame!

options.text: Could it be, she's just like me—!?

name: Cinderella
text:
In this Tokyo, there was a rule that those
with the same Role and Rule had to be 'all alone'.

name: Cinderella
text:
But since the outer vessel has burned away,
the contents have no choice but to spill out, and the time of magic is over.

name: Hogen
text:
You guys, be careful!
I can feel multiple presences from Cinderella!!

name: Oscar
text:
Inside the warehouse, the burnt remains, us watching over the revival...
Oh no. This is no longer T.S.L. or Tokyo!!

name: Shennong
text:
Ah, damn, so that's what it is...!
Don't leave my side, [Player].

name: Shennong
text:
It's a little different from the 'it' that I know.
But, I'm finally starting to understand its true identity—!

In the face of the abnormal situation, those other than Cinderella naturally gather in one place.
In the meantime, the flames fill the warehouse with coordinated movements.

options.text: What on earth is wrong with you!?
Could this be, a world alteration...!

text:
The flames surrounding [Player] and the others suddenly increase in brightness.
The light becomes strong enough to rob everyone of their vision—

name: Red Hood
text:
Sandra...?
What's going on!?

name: Cinderella
text:
Everyone here is my comrade.
'We've lived our lives covered in ashes, and have lost our time to die'.

Cinderella's figure disappears
into the countless Cinderellas.

name: Cinderella
text:
Cinderella. That's one of the names we were given in this Tokyo,
by the first child we saved when we came to this land.

One of them comes out and says—
But, no one can tell if it's really 'that' Cinderella.

name: Cinderella
text:
Huma, Suzaku, Zhar-ptitsa. An immortal being, a bird that does not die.
We were called by many names in many lands. The first name we were called was 'Bennu'.

However, they are all just names. Under one common definition,
different civilizations have conveniently named her, which originally has no meaning to her.

name: Cinderella
text:
Seeing us rise from the ashes as if by magic,
tens of thousands of humans reached out to receive the same blessing of immortality—

name: Cinderella
text:
And lost their lives in the flames.
If you intend to follow in their footsteps—

The many 'Cinderellas' all at once
strike a dancing pose and click their shoes.

name: Cinderella
text:
Without distinction, without discrimination.
You will all meet the same end.

name: Cinderella
text:
The 'immortal flame' and the 'symbol of prosperity'.
However— only I will survive and prosper.

It increases. It increases.
Cinderella is buried in the crowd.

It was as if, at the end of that fairy tale,
the magic wore off and she returned to being 'ash-covered'.

The bell on the clock rings. Dawn approaches.
Now, before the magic wears off, I have to get home from here.

Because the magician who gave the woman a dress with magic
and a glass slipper had said so.

The fun dream ends here.
Now, it's time to return to being 'just a girl covered in ashes'.

If this were a fairy tale, the prince would probably
take the glass slipper that was dropped and look for her.

And so, he would probably find the 'just a girl covered in ashes'
who had blended into the crowd of the city.

But that's not a real story.
Because there are plenty of people who can wear the same size shoes.

options.text: Which one of them is the real Cinderella?

text:
—An 'existence whose death is not defined',
one of the most famous of which is the phoenix.

They are revered as symbols of regeneration,
and their 'Faith' exists beyond the framework of the world.

One of them, in the otherworld Aaru, is believed to be born at sunrise,
die at sunset, and be resurrected at the next sunrise.

In some worlds, it is an existence that burns itself to death when its life is about to end,
and is born again from the ashes.

The flame that revives even when extinguished became a concept of
'regeneration and prosperity' for those who built civilizations.

Someone compared the flame that beautifully dances at sunrise to a 'bird'.
It crossed the world as a 'Faith'.

'Faith' gave shape to the concept,
and the immortal existence manifested as a sacred bird of immortal flame.

How could this happen,
the sacred bird herself into the fire...!

Calm down, you're being disrespectful.
That person dies and is resurrected, just like the rising and setting of the sun.

—She has truly revived!
Ah, this is our 'immortal flame'...!

Yes, as long as she is with us,
our prosperity is guaranteed!!

Eventually, civilization will develop sufficiently, and someone arrogant
will reach out to obtain that immortality for themselves.

But the legend that 'the phoenix granted immortality to all of humanity'
does not remain in any world.

Humans who reach out for immortality die.
Without distinction, without discrimination... uniformly burned.

name: Red Hood
text:
Sandra...?
And the immortal flame...!

name: Oscar
text:
...Immortal beings are 'believed' in
in various forms across the walls of the world.

name: Oscar
text:
It seems that she embodied many of them.
Because in Tokyo, only one set of the same Role and Rule is allowed.

name: Hogen
text:
I see... Just like me, and [Player].
It's all the more fateful, isn't it, Cinderella?

name: Oscar
text:
The fact that we can still talk like this is
because of this world alteration... Either way, there's not much time left.

name: Shennong
text:
It doesn't quite click to say that you, the fire brigade leader and the firebird
from my hometown are the same. The you right now would fit better.

name: Shennong
text:
But, that's just how it is in Penglai.
If you're in Tokyo, there must have been a form that Tokyo wanted, right?

name: Red Hood
text:
Sandra, I heard that you were scouted by the Tokyo
Firefighting University for rescuing a child from a fire.

name: Red Hood
text:
If that was right after you were transferred,
then the 'Cinderella' who was protecting everyone as a firefighter is you, right?

name: Yuma
text:
Cinderella, protected everyone.
Then, what's, wrong? Cinderella, what, return to?

options.text: That's right, you were just doing your duty.
Who are you right now, anyway?

name: Cinderella
text:
The many names are just names.
'Cinderella' was supposed to be one of them.

name: Cinderella
text:
However, you all have given a special meaning
to being 'Cinderella'.

name: Cinderella
text:
Not as a symbol of awe, but as 'Cinderella',
you urged me to establish a self that is not a phoenix.

name: Cinderella
text:
...You all, you've gotten close to me.
But, you know what happens to creatures that get close to fire.

name: Cinderella
text:
They burn, and they die. That's all.
...You all, don't get any closer to us.

name: Cinderella
text:
Therefore, I will give you a choice.
One, leave this space and sever your ties with us.

Cinderella scatters flames and points her finger.
A narrow path that seems to be the exit of this room, which is an altar, lit up.

name: Oscar
text:
And if we don't obey, what will possibly happen...
A question like that is too cliché, isn't it?

Cinderella silently makes the flames crawl.
Unlike before, it had a heat that burned the skin.

name: Red Hood
text:
Even if you say that so suddenly...!
And, you guys, why did you suddenly come out now!?

name: Red Hood
text:
Please...
Go back to the Sandra you were before!!

name: Hogen
text:
...You want to go back, but you can't, right?
Cinderella, you've lost your physical vessel once.

name: Hogen
text:
And with that, you've released the contents of those
with the same Role and Rule to outside the vessel.

name: Hogen
text:
Only one Transient with the same combination
of Role and Rule can remain here.

name: Hogen
text:
Because a Transient who has lost their Role
and Rule cannot remain in this Tokyo.

options.text: So if we can tell them apart?

name: Hogen
text:
If you can tell them apart, yes.
But, my disciple, didn't I just tell you?

name: Hogen
text:
Those with the same combination of Role and Rule
are sometimes indistinguishable from others.

name: Hogen
text:
And... whether Cinderella herself
wants that in the first place.

options.text: Can we do it if we 'sever' them...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I, hate, forcibly, taken out of cage. If, if...
Cinderella, same way, don't want to stop her. But!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But, going into cage, on my own, and being forcibly, put in, are different.
I, what should I do...

options.text: I haven't heard what she wants to do.
I can't judge from the outside...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I, hate, forcibly, taken out of cage. If, if...
Cinderella, same way, don't want to stop her. But!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But, going into cage, on my own, and being forcibly, put in, are different.
I, what should I do...

name: Hogen
text:
Yes, and when Cinderella was first engulfed in flames,
it looked as if she had accepted it—

name: Cinderella
text:
...I see.
You're telling me not to forget what I am.

name: Shennong
text:
Ah, I saw it too.
She didn't try to shake off the clinging flames.

name: Red Hood
text:
No, that can't be true of Sandra...
Because she said she was looking forward to the fireworks!!

name: Hogen
text:
Well, calm down. Didn't I tell you when it was my turn?
...Ask her yourself, I said.

name: Hogen
text:
I doubt that old woman will answer honestly,
but it's worth asking her yourself.

name: Shennong
text:
I agree with that.
Being quietly disappeared is a landmine for me too.

name: Yuma
text:
Rndure, enter cage. Painful.
But now, same, unable to see, inside cage. What to do—

name: Shennong
text:
Fortunately or unfortunately, our problem child here
has the sword to step into someone's territory without hesitation.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hahaha, I'll leave the interpretation to you.
...I've learned something new again.
I'm an adult, so I'm quite cunning myself.

name: Yuma
text:
What, do you mean.
Can [Player], solve this?

name: Shennong
text:
It's a hypothesis. If one of those many is Cinderella,
and can be distinguished from the other 'immortal beings'—

name: Shennong
text:
—Then [Player] might be
able to separate them.

name: Cinderella
text:
Rather than interpreting it as we letting you escape,
are you going to stand against us without accepting it instead...?

name: Oscar
text:
It's not that big of a deal.
Is this... a so-called audition?

name: Oscar
text:
A grand stage, an actor that everyone recognizes. But
without a script, that's all. Isn't that what you are now?

name: Oscar
text:
So, let us find out.
Whether the scriptwriter that suits you is yourself, or that of 'Faith'.

name: Oscar
text:
And while it's still confined to the warehouse,
until the park has closed and all the guests have left T.S.L...
I would like to avoid such a situation.

name: Cinderella
text:
As I've said many times, all who have approached us
have been burned by the flames and have left this world.

name: Cinderella
text:
If you won't accept that...
I guess I have no choice but to roast you until you give up?

The flames surrounding [Player] and the others
gather towards Cinderella.

name: Hogen
text:
It seems there's no room for discussion.
But we've already have a plan, don't we, [Player]?

options.text: I'll 'sever' them when I get a chance.

name: Yuma
text:
[Player], sever, create opening.
Understood, leave it to me, have idea.

name: Shennong
text:
Then I'll be on the front lines too.
We wouldn't want to repeat the same tragedy twice.

name: Hogen
text:
Now, Red Hood.
We're all ready, but what about you?

name: Red Hood
text:
...Hey, Sandra.
Didn't I promise you that I'd eat you up like I did with Grandma?

name: Red Hood
text:
You promised, you liar!
I'm not giving up, you hear!?

name: Red Hood
text:
I don't want Cinderella... my buddy,
to be taken away silently. So everyone, lend me your strength—!!
Battle Start

name: Cinderella
text:
—Let yourselves return to ashes.
"Rekindled Ashes", Weben Wa Hu!!

name: Yuma
text:
More ferocious, than picture book!
Like, being pecked, by flock, of vultures?

name: Oscar
text:
The flames are just that of a living bird...!
This rhythm, just like the famous composer Stravinsky's 'The Firebird'!!

name: Oscar
text:
That's the 'Firebird' of Kitezh, [Player].
It's not the Cinderella you know, for one!

name: Yuma
text:
Woof woof... Grrr!
Chomp, nom nom... This feather, analysis complete.

name: Yuma
text:
Hermaphrodite, Cinderella, is not!
Smells, like Pazuzu, from Ueno...?

name: Hogen
text:
Then, it is probably the Huma 'Phoenix' of Midearth.
As a great tengu, I am familiar with it as it is related to my teachings.

name: Hogen
text:
To be able to distinguish by ear, nose, and tongue without relying on my divine eye.
Hahaha, there is much to learn even at this age... Oops!?

Even as they do so, the flapping
of the phoenixes' wings becomes flames and attacks [Player] and the others.

name: Shennong
text:
Tsk, it's certainly a fire that looks alive.
But if she's controlling it, I can predict its moves—

Shennong takes a step back from the front line,
and countless curtain-like lights appear from his body.

options.text: It's appearing in the same place as the flames...
Shennong has this kind of power?

name: Hogen
text:
This light...!
Is he predicting the trajectory of the flames?

name: Shennong
text:
The Suzaku of Penglai is a 'firebird' of good omen,
not an ill omen that reacts to this aurora— So...

name: Shennong
text:
That's why, the one who attacked through
the path of this light is not Cinderella!

name: Hogen
text:
That's a great help!
But we're not getting anywhere just by dodging.

name: Oscar
text:
Hmm, a playwright who shuts himself in fiction is actually
good at real fights... Wouldn't you think of that as a good development?

name: Oscar
text:
And to think he was a noble knight who would
put his life on the line to create opportunities for his comrades!

Shennong, Hogen, Oscar, and Yuma
desperately suppress the approaching flames and identify their opponent.

And there are three shadows left.
Among those, which one is the real Cinderella—?

In the meantime, Red Hood takes off his red riding hood
and puts it on [Player]'s head.

name: Red Hood
text:
You're the key, [Player].
A good luck charm just in case.
Give it back to me later, alright? Promise!

name: Red Hood
text:
I'll support you too, so go!
"...Once upon a time, a wolf blew down the little pig's house with a single breath—"

The wind raised by Red Hood
creates a path to Cinderella. And then—

options.text: It's your time to shine, grand master.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text: Got it, I'll show you what I've got!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text: If you can keep up with me, I'll give you a big reward later?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Understood, [Player].
Your chance, definitely, make it!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Grrrrr!
Gaaaah...!!

text:
Yuma takes the lead and weaves through the flames,
relying on Shennong's aurora.

Just as Cinderella's attention was diverted to Yuma,
Hogen suddenly appeared in front of Cinderella.

options.text: Aim for the opening Hogen created!

name: Hogen
text:
Now, will you dodge and expose an opening, or take it and expose an opening?
Choose whichever you like!!

Cinderella did not dodge.
She took Hogen's attack head-on, but—

They are 'phoenixes'. The wounds they receive are instantly
healed by the flames, and they do not flinch at all.
They can dodge the blade of [Player] who came later.

Furthermore, with the momentum of her dodge,
she grabs [Player]'s wrist and throws them with one hand.

Immediately after rolling helplessly on the ground,
the light of the aurora indicating the arrival of the flames envelops [Player].

name: Everyone
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">[Player]...!!

name: Cinderella
text:
You didn't make it in time, so this would be our farewell.
"Rekindled Ashes", Weben Wa—

name: Red Hood
text:
—Everyone is drawing their attention.
Thanks to that, I was able to get close to Sandra!

name: Red Hood
text:
She probably doesn't even see me because she's immortal,
but I'm going to get serious, so watch me, Sandra!!

name: Red Hood
text:
"...Once upon a time, in a certain forest,
there was a wolf who was after a girl in a red riding hood—"

name: Red Hood
text:
"The wolf went ahead and attacked the girl's grandmother,
and 'switched places' to ambush Little Red Riding Hood"... so they say!

Before the flames,
[Player]'s vision is dazzled by light.

At the same time as the feeling of the hood disappeared, their vision returned.
And in front of them, for some reason, was Cinderella releasing flames at Red Hood.

—[Player] was standing
where Red Hood should have been.

name: Cinderella
text:
...!! Reddy, where did you—
Could it be, your positions have switched...!?

name: Cinderella
text:
Knowing you'd be engulfed in my flames...?
You probably won't be revived from the ashes.

options.text: I don't really get it, but this is a chance!
So that's what the red hood was for.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's a fireproof hood!
Don't worry about me, get Sandra—!!

name: Hogen
text:
We'll save Red Hood!
Go on, my beloved disciple!!

name: Yuma
text:
I, carry him.
Hogen, the flames, counting on you!

name: Oscar
text:
Now, time for the climax!
Will you be the star of the show, my dear first aid team leader?

name: Shennong
text:
...Ah, alright?
Handle me well, Director-dono?

With everyone's support,
[Player] entered the range again.

There are two shadows left.
They couldn't narrow it down to the end.

...To think that they would threaten me so much and not flinch
in the slightest, what a bunch of foolish ash-covered people.

I remember, our past friendship.
I remember, our past love.

I thought once in a lifetime was enough.
I thought I should never get serious again.

name: Cinderella
text: —But.

dialogue_after_selection.text: [Player] slides their sword between one of the Cinderellas and the flames surrounding her—

options.text: Let me hear your answer, Cinderella!

dialogue_after_selection.text: [Player] slides their sword between one of the Cinderellas and the flames surrounding her—
[Player] avoids the flames and grasps Cinderella's hand, which is engraved with countless wrinkles.
And, as [Player] slides their sword between one of the Cinderellas and the flames surrounding her—

name: The Other 'Ash-Covered One'
text:
...What makes you think that? How did you tell us apart?
That that's your 'Cinderella'.

note: wrong background, so you'll have to make do

dialogue_after_selection.name: The Other 'Ash-Covered One'
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...You're a liar.
Are you 'not afraid of the wolf'?

dialogue_after_selection.name: The Other 'Ash-Covered One'
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I see, so the magic isn't over yet.
Then— It's only natural for this to happen in a fairy tale.

dialogue_after_selection.name: The Other 'Ash-Covered One'
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Ahahaha! I see.
Did you smell the same fairy tale as that Reddy?

name: The Other 'Ash-Covered One'
text:
...That's right, that's
'your Cinderella', so take her along.

name: The Other 'Ash-Covered One'
text:
Living a long life isn't so bad.
Thanks to that, I was able to see— what I wanted to see.

name: The Other 'Ash-Covered One'
text:
I always wondered. If that prince could have
recognized me without the glass slipper.

name: The Other 'Ash-Covered One'
text:
But, now, I've known the answer.
So I... will gladly leave this Tokyo.

name: Cinderella
text:
Hey, you...
When did you get inside me?

name: The Other 'Ash-Covered One'
text:
You've taken in a lot, you know.
Don't you remember, when we stopped by Tír na nÓg—

name: The Other 'Ash-Covered One'
text:
A woman whose death after 'happily ever after' was not told,
asked 'please take me with you'.

name: Cinderella
text:
...What a thing!
To think the 'real one' was inside me all along!?

name: Cinderella
text:
To not be satisfied with just one transformation into a princess,
your flame is quite hot and persistent.

name: The Other 'Ash-Covered One'
text:
The real one here is you.
...At least, for these kids.

name: The Other 'Ash-Covered One'
text:
Take responsibility for the magic you cast on this child...
Come again, let's meet again.

name: Hogen
text:
The flames are gone.
Did it go well?

name: Yuma
text:
Red Hood, alright?
Engulfed, in flames.

name: Red Hood
text:
I'm fine...
Sandra, are Sandra and [Player] alright?

Cinderella doesn't answer right away,
but looks around at [Player] and the others in turn.

The heart-wrenching feeling she had when she saw them
doing training together and playing in the park.

That too was probably just envy.
Because she had been revered, she didn't know how to treat them as equals, but—

—That itself might have been her weakness,
a place where she should have relied on others, Cinderella thinks.

name: Red Hood
text:
...Sandra, I'm still not strong enough, but
from now on, I'll be able to watch your back—

name: Cinderella
text:
You're more admirable than me, Reddy.
What you and [Player] did, I can't possibly imitate.

name: Yuma
text:
Then, Cinderella,
with us, from now on, together?

name: Shennong
text:
...Wait a minute, if that was the case,
then how are we not back in Tokyo just yet—?

No sooner had he finished speaking than
the surroundings burst into flames again.

name: Yuma
text:
'Immortal Flame'...
Could it be, the flame, main body?

name: Oscar
text:
As expected of you, Yuma-kun, what a brilliant answer!!
What [Player] separated was the flame, and—

name: Hogen
text:
—To sever the connection with this space,
we have to do something about that flame now!?

name: Shennong
text:
One misfortune after another.
Honestly, following a reckless person is a pain!

name: Red Hood
text:
I-I, can still
go on!!

name: Shennong
text:
You were just on fire, weren't you!
Leave that to your energetic junior!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text: Y-You aren't influenced by the tone of the person who sold us the fire brigade goods the other day, are you...?

options.text: What do you think of your student?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hahaha!
They do say that you should make your cute child travel.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text: It's alright, I have a special tonic with me, you know?

text:
Cinderella herself knew well that she should not feel
the emotions she was feeling after putting everyone in danger with her own judgment.

However, the emotions that overflowed in her chest
were far from guilt—

name: Cinderella
text:
—Step back. My will is no longer
the same as that of the 'Immortal Flame'. I can say it clearly now.

name: Cinderella
text:
...It was a good escort.
I've fallen in love with you all over again, you ash-covered brats!!

name: Cinderella
text:
I am Cinderella, the princess of flames who lives in Tokyo.
I ask the insolent ones who interrupt the ball to leave at once!!

The flame swallows the flame.
The flame of the Flaming Mountains will eventually disappear.

options.text: I can finally take a breath.
I wonder how much time has passed.

text:
As everyone let out a sigh of relief,
Cinderella stepped forward and bowed her head.

name: Cinderella
text:
...Honestly, you're cunning.
I'm not supposed to be able to defy the promise of time—

name: Cinderella
text:
Or, [Player],
do you have a sword that can transcend time?

name: Cinderella
text:
There's a mountain of things to do, but
first, I want to say something to you all—

name: Red Hood
text:
—Hey, listen, everyone!
It's still show time, so we can still make it to the fireworks!!

options.text: Oscar, what about the special seats?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course, they're ready!
I'll close this place off and show you the way immediately!!

options.text: We can still make it to Amduscias' live show!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Let's go, all of us, safe.
So, no need, apologize. Now, hurry, go back.

name: Shennong
text:
That's right, it's especially large-scale today.
The debriefing can be postponed, but this can't.

name: Hogen
text:
Yes, and a get-together after overcoming a trial
is a perfect opportunity to get closer as friends.

name: Cinderella
text:
...That's right,
I can't take up any more of your time.

name: Red Hood
text:
Alright, it's decided!
Oscar-san, please show us the way!

name: Oscar
text:
Understood. Then, the final chapter!
Let us end the tropical country vacation with a grand fireworks display!!

name: Yuma
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">Am-sa-ma—!!

name: Shennong
text:
Yuma-kun is like a different person...
It's fine to be enthusiastic, but make sure to stay hydrated!

name: Hogen
text:
To think that we'd also be jumping into the special area.
Director-dono, aren't you afraid of what will happen after you've gone this far?

name: Oscar
text:
I don't mind. Compared to this tropical country being engulfed in flames,
the words from various places are like a lullaby to me.

name: Red Hood
text:
Wow, the surprise slot is too gorgeous!
The person I wanted to meet is so close...!!

name: Cinderella
text:
Nice, doesn't it just excite you?
[Player], do you have a favorite?

options.text: I don't know much about them—
I guess this is Yuma's turn—

text:
With the addition of a production unique to a tropical theme park,
it showed a great enthusiasm that erased all bad memories.

After that, the park's lighting
is turned down to a minimum.

The atmosphere of the park, which is swelling with anticipation and tension,
is broken by bright music and a drone show—

In the park, which is hard to believe is underground,
vivid fireworks were set off one after another.

name: Cinderella
text:
Yes, the echo has improved.
There's almost no smell of gunpowder, and the exhaust is working well—

name: Red Hood
text:
S-Sandra!!
The special shark is observing for us, so it's alright!!

name: Cinderella
text:
Ahahaha,
I guess this is my occupational hazard!?

options.text: Well, we are here for work.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eeeehh!?
Am I the only one who's carefree!?

text:
Oscar's favorite was not just for show, the night sky colored by the
perfectly calculated production was like a painting changing.

In the midst of that, a hand was placed on the shoulders
of [Player] and Red Hood, who were looking up at the fireworks.

name: Cinderella
text:
I'll dare to say this. You two did a great job. Full marks.
If I had been alone, I probably wouldn't have been able to get everyone out safely.

name: Red Hood
text:
Then, you've reflected on
charging into the scene a little?

name: Cinderella
text:
That's right, you've made me realize.
That even if I charge in, my juniors will cover for me.

name: Red Hood
text:
You haven't reflected at all!
[Player], say something to her!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Try it if you can!!
But, I'll admit your charge just now was impressive.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You two, this isn't a competition!
My heart can't take it, so stop it!!

options.text: Charge in with peace of mind.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What a reliable junior.
Then I'll leave my back to you!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey!
Sandra's buddy is me! Me!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Then, we're a pair, right?
Or... shall we try it out as a trio!?

name: Cinderella
text:
Thank you... my Prince Charmings.
I love you all!!

As she says that, Cinderella
returns her gaze to the fireworks.

The fireworks that are launched, bloom brilliantly, disappear, and are launched again,
her shadow watching them is hidden by the flames— and still cannot be seen.

Tropical Burn Holiday
~Move Out! Southern Fire Brigade~
Continue to Epilogue—
